about_the_game:
You are assigned a mission to solve a mystery that is written about in the newspapers, but that no one believes in. You act as an undercover security guard, traveling to an old facility to observe what is going on.

You have a lot of exciting opportunities. You have access to a variety of gadgets:

Gadgets

  • Camera Viewing: Use cameras to watch every corner of the building and understand what's going on there.

  • Fixing equipment: You will have to constantly maintain your equipment so that it doesn't break down at the worst possible moment.

  • Playing Sounds: Repel abnormal skibidi toilets with special sounds to keep them from approaching your location.

  • Electric Box: Control energy consumption and lighting in your office with an electric box.

Will be added in the next update

  • Find Finds: Detect strange symbols on cameras and get points for doing so, which you can sell to journalists to improve your equipment.

  • Mental State: Your mental state will be put to the test during the game. You will have to contend with poor vision, blurry images and other effects.

  • Purchase office improvements: Purchase various items that will help you improve your mental state.
detailed_description:
UPDATE INFORMATION


About the Game

You are assigned a mission to solve a mystery that is written about in the newspapers, but that no one believes in. You act as an undercover security guard, traveling to an old facility to observe what is going on.

You have a lot of exciting opportunities. You have access to a variety of gadgets:

Gadgets

  • Camera Viewing: Use cameras to watch every corner of the building and understand what's going on there.

  • Fixing equipment: You will have to constantly maintain your equipment so that it doesn't break down at the worst possible moment.

  • Playing Sounds: Repel abnormal skibidi toilets with special sounds to keep them from approaching your location.

  • Electric Box: Control energy consumption and lighting in your office with an electric box.

Will be added in the next update

  • Find Finds: Detect strange symbols on cameras and get points for doing so, which you can sell to journalists to improve your equipment.

  • Mental State: Your mental state will be put to the test during the game. You will have to contend with poor vision, blurry images and other effects.

  • Purchase office improvements: Purchase various items that will help you improve your mental state.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX570 | NVIDIA GTX 1050TI
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: The minimum PC components on which the game was tested*. The game will be able to run smoothly on lower performance
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX6700XT | NVIDIA RTX 4070 | 3GB+ Vram
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: No

short_description: FNAST offers a unique gameplay that combines elements of strategy, survival and horror. Will you be able to solve the mystery of this mysterious building and prove the truth of the information from the newspapers?
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Italian, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian
